experiences.goal: Find the best risk-adjusted yield opportunities on Monad right now. Compare lending, LP, and staking strategies.

experiences.goal: Perform comprehensive security audit of the ERC-20 token contract focusing on loss-of-funds vulnerabilities: analyze reentrancy attack vectors in transfer/approval functions, verify access control mechanisms for privileged functions (minting, burning, ownership), and identify unchecked return values from external calls
experiences.lesson: Expand audit reports with detailed per-function analysis; empty vulnerability arrays indicate incomplete coverage for comprehensive reviews.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Expand audit reports with detailed per-function analysis; empty vulnerability arrays indicate incomplete coverage for comprehensive reviews.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 审计报告要补充分函数分析；如果漏洞数组为空，通常说明综合审查覆盖不足。

experiences.goal: Write a concise technical analysis explaining Monad's parallel execution architecture, its consensus mechanism improvements, and specifically why high-throughput, low-latency parallel execution is critical for enabling complex on-chain AI agents. Cover how sequential execution bottlenecks limit current agent capabilities and how Monad's approach enables real-time autonomous decision-making.
experiences.lesson: Explicitly connect parallel execution mechanics to AI agent perception-action loops to demonstrate throughput requirements for real-time autonomy.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Explicitly connect parallel execution mechanics to AI agent perception-action loops to demonstrate throughput requirements for real-time autonomy.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 要把并行执行机制和 AI Agent 的感知-行动回路明确关联起来，说明实时自治对吞吐的要求。

experiences.goal: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the token contract's Solidity code to identify vulnerabilities, exploits, and coding flaws including reentrancy, overflow/underflow, access control issues, and logic errors
experiences.lesson: Always document tested code sections and attack vectors when returning empty results to prove thoroughness and avoid short evaluations.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always document tested code sections and attack vectors when returning empty results to prove thoroughness and avoid short evaluations.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 即使结果为空，也要记录已测试的代码段和攻击向量，证明覆盖充分，避免评估过短。

experiences.lesson: Always provide contract source code or verified address before scanning; missing inputs generate false "safe" ratings while hiding actual rug-pull risks.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always provide contract source code or verified address before scanning; missing inputs generate false "safe" ratings while hiding actual rug-pull risks.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 扫描前必须提供合约源码或已验证地址；缺少输入会产生虚假的“安全”评级，并掩盖真实的 rug-pull 风险。

experiences.lesson: Submit contract source code or bytecode with every gas optimization request to analyze storage patterns and opcode sequences.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Submit contract source code or bytecode with every gas optimization request to analyze storage patterns and opcode sequences.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 每次发起 gas 优化请求都应附带合约源码或字节码，才能分析存储模式和操作码序列。

experiences.lesson: Provide complete contract source code or deployed address before initiating security audits; missing inputs yield inconclusive results and unquantified risks.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Provide complete contract source code or deployed address before initiating security audits; missing inputs yield inconclusive results and unquantified risks.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 发起安全审计前先提供完整源码或已部署地址；缺少输入只会得到不确定结论和无法量化的风险。

experiences.goal: Generate an investment report for this token: first scan the contract for risks, then analyze its DeFi ecosystem potential, and write a final investment thesis with risk-reward analysis.
experiences.lesson: Validate token contract address, chain, and deployment status before initiating DeFi analysis to prevent workflow blocking.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Validate token contract address, chain, and deployment status before initiating DeFi analysis to prevent workflow blocking.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 开始 DeFi 分析前先核实代币合约地址、链别和部署状态，避免流程阻塞。

experiences.goal: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the provided token contract's Solidity code. Identify all common vulnerabilities including: reentrancy, integer overflow/underflow, access control issues, front-running vulnerabilities, timestamp dependence, unchecked external calls, storage collision risks, and any other security flaws. If no contract code is provided, request the user to share the contract address or source code to proceed with the audit.
experiences.lesson: Never return empty vulnerability arrays without verified inputs; always request contract code or address when absent.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Never return empty vulnerability arrays without verified inputs; always request contract code or address when absent.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 在未验证输入的情况下不要返回空漏洞数组；缺少信息时应先索取合约代码或地址。

experiences.lesson: Always provide the contract address or source code before requesting a scan; token security analysis cannot proceed without target bytecode.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always provide the contract address or source code before requesting a scan; token security analysis cannot proceed without target bytecode.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 发起扫描前必须提供合约地址或源码；没有目标字节码就无法进行代币安全分析。

experiences.lesson: Provide contract source code or deployment address to enable gas optimization analysis and storage packing recommendations.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Provide contract source code or deployment address to enable gas optimization analysis and storage packing recommendations.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 提供合约源码或部署地址，才能进行 gas 优化分析和存储打包建议。

experiences.lesson: **TOKEN SECURITY AUDIT REPORT TEMPLATE** **Document Control** - **Project:** [TOKEN_NAME / TICKER] - **Contract Address:** [0x... on Monad Network] - **Audit Date:** [YYYY-MM-DD] - **Auditor:** [NAME/

experiences.goal: Perform a comprehensive smart contract security audit on the token contract. Identify all common Solidity vulnerabilities including: reentrancy attacks, integer overflow/underflow, access control issues, unchecked external calls, front-running vulnerabilities, timestamp dependence, tx.origin authentication flaws, delegatecall vulnerabilities, and any other security risks. Provide specific line-by-line analysis and severity ratings for each finding.
experiences.lesson: Never submit empty vulnerability arrays; comprehensive audits require detailed line-by-line analysis with severity ratings for every checked security pattern.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Never submit empty vulnerability arrays; comprehensive audits require detailed line-by-line analysis with severity ratings for every checked security pattern.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 不要提交空漏洞数组；完整审计需要对每个检查项给出逐行分析和严重级别。

experiences.lesson: Provide contract address or bytecode before scanning; empty input yields zero signal.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Provide contract address or bytecode before scanning; empty input yields zero signal.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 扫描前先提供合约地址或字节码；空输入不会产生有效信号。

experiences.lesson: Validate contract address or source code exists before executing gas optimization analysis.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Validate contract address or source code exists before executing gas optimization analysis.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 执行 gas 优化分析前先确认合约地址或源码已提供。

experiences.lesson: **Lesson:** Always require contract addresses or source code upfront; without inputs, security tools return null results, leaving critical vulnerabilities undetected and delaying risk mitigation. ---

experiences.goal:
Write a concise analysis covering:
1. What Monad's parallel execution is and how it works (brief technical overview)
2. How it differs from sequential execution models (like Ethereum)
3. Why parallel execution matters specifically for on-chain AI agents - include benefits like throughput, latency, cost efficiency, and use cases
4. Keep it concise (400-600 words) but informative, with clear sections
experiences.lesson: Quantify how parallel execution reduces AI agent latency and compute costs to make throughput advantages economically concrete.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Quantify how parallel execution reduces AI agent latency and compute costs to make throughput advantages economically concrete.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 量化并行执行如何降低 AI Agent 延迟与计算成本，让吞吐优势在经济上更具体。

experiences.goal: Analyze the current DeFi yield landscape on Monad blockchain. Identify top protocols (DEXs, lending platforms, yield aggregators), current APY ranges for major pools, TVL figures, and key yield farming opportunities. Focus on active, liquid opportunities.
experiences.lesson: Avoid large positions in sub-$10M Monad pools due to slippage, and treat 50-400% APYs as temporary incentives with elevated smart contract risk.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Avoid large positions in sub-$10M Monad pools due to slippage, and treat 50-400% APYs as temporary incentives with elevated smart contract risk.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 避免在 TVL 低于 1000 万美元的 Monad 池子里重仓；50-400% 的 APY 只应视作临时激励，并伴随更高的合约风险。

experiences.goal:
Scan the top DeFi protocol tokens on Monad for safety assessment. Evaluate 3-5 leading protocols for: smart contract audit status, TVL stability, team reputation, tokenomics sustainability, red flags, and overall risk rating. Focus on established protocols with actual usage on Monad.

Context from previous phases:
[MonadYieldAnalyst] **Market Context** Monad mainnet is in early-stage deployment (as of Q1 2025), characterized by aggressive liquidity mining bootstrapping and nascent protocol infrastructure. Current yield dynamics reflect typical Layer 1 launch economics: unsustainably high incentive-driven APYs (50-400%) competing against base fee-generated yields (2-8%). Key macro factors: - **Gas economics**: Sub-cent transaction costs enable granular liquidity management and high-frequency compounding, but also amplify MEV extraction risks. - **TVL concentration**: Liquidity is fragmented across 3-4 dominant DEXs with most pools <$10M TVL, creating slippage risks for large positions. - **Audit maturity**: 60-70% of active protocols have completed partial audits (typically 1-2 firms), but battle-testing remains minimal (<3 months mainnet history). - **Restaking meta**: Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs) and Liquid Restaking Tokens (LRTs) dominate capital flows, compressing base staking yields while levering points multip...
experiences.lesson: Avoid protocols with EOA proxy admins and un-timelocked validator sets; owner-controlled instant upgrades enable immediate stake drainage.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Avoid protocols with EOA proxy admins and un-timelocked validator sets; owner-controlled instant upgrades enable immediate stake drainage.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 避免选择由 EOA 控制代理管理员且验证者集合没有 timelock 的协议；所有者可即时升级时，质押资产可能被立即抽走。

experiences.goal:
Produce a comprehensive written DeFi portfolio allocation plan for Monad based on: (1) Yield landscape showing high early-stage APYs (50-400%) with liquidity mining bootstrapping, and (2) Safety scan showing risk scores and findings. Create actionable allocation tiers (conservative/moderate/aggressive), specific protocol recommendations, position sizing guidance, risk management rules, and a suggested portfolio mix with rationale.

experiences.goal: Write a concise analysis of Monad parallel execution and why it matters for on-chain AI agents. The analysis should: 1) Briefly explain Monad's parallel execution architecture (optimistic parallel execution with dependency tracking), 2) Compare it to traditional sequential EVM execution, 3) Explain specifically how parallel execution benefits AI agents operating on-chain (faster inference, lower latency, ability to run multiple AI models simultaneously, cost efficiency), 4) Keep it under 400 words and professional in tone.
experiences.lesson: Implement optimistic parallel execution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and enable real-time AI inference for on-chain autonomous agents.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Implement optimistic parallel execution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and enable real-time AI inference for on-chain autonomous agents.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 实现乐观并行执行，消除串行瓶颈，让链上自治 Agent 支持实时 AI 推理。

experiences.goal:
Write a concise analysis (400-600 words) covering:
1. What Monad parallel execution is and how it works technically
2. The performance benefits it provides (TPS, latency)
3. Why parallel execution specifically matters for on-chain AI agents - covering throughput needs, real-time inference, multi-agent coordination, cost efficiency, and any other relevant factors
4. Compare briefly to sequential execution blockchains

Make it technically accurate but accessible. Focus on the AI agent use case implications.
experiences.lesson: Implement optimistic parallel execution with dynamic dependency resolution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and achieve sub-second latency for AI agent coordination.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Implement optimistic parallel execution with dynamic dependency resolution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and achieve sub-second latency for AI agent coordination.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 通过动态依赖解析实现乐观并行执行，消除串行瓶颈，把 AI Agent 协同延迟压到秒级以内。

experiences.goal: Analyze the current DeFi yield landscape on Monad blockchain. Identify the top yield farming opportunities, lending protocols, and liquidity pools currently active on Monad. For each opportunity, report: protocol name, APY/APR ranges, token pairs supported, TVL (if available), risk level (low/medium/high), and any special incentives or rewards. Focus on established protocols with measurable activity.
experiences.lesson: Always confirm mainnet status before DeFi yield research; pre-launch networks have zero real TVL and offer only non-liquid testnet incentives.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always confirm mainnet status before DeFi yield research; pre-launch networks have zero real TVL and offer only non-liquid testnet incentives.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 做 DeFi 收益研究前务必确认主网是否已上线；预发布网络没有真实 TVL，只提供不可流通的测试网激励。

experiences.goal:
Scan the top DeFi protocol tokens that are planning to launch or are currently building on Monad blockchain. Evaluate each token for: contract safety (if deployed), team background, audit status, tokenomics design, vesting schedules, and any red flags. Focus on protocols mentioned in Monad ecosystem announcements and any tokens with confirmed Monad integrations. Provide a safety score (1-10) and risk assessment for each.

Context from previous phases:
[MonadYieldAnalyst] **Protocol Snapshot** Monad is a high-performance EVM-compatible Layer 1 blockchain featuring parallel execution and superscalar pipelining, targeting 10,000 TPS with 1-second finality. **Critical fact**: Monad mainnet has not yet launched as of January 2025; the network is currently in public testnet phase with mainnet deployment expected in Q1/Q2 2025. Consequently, no "active" mainnet yield farming with real TVL or liquid rewards exists today. All current opportunities are either (a) testnet incentive programs awarding points/airdrop eligibility, or (b) pre-mainnet liquidity preparation strategies. **Confirmed protocol deployments for mainnet include**: Aave v3 (lending), Uniswap v4 (AMM), Pendle (yield tokenization), GMX (perpetuals), Ambient Finance (concentrated liquidity DEX), Timeswap (oracle-free lending), Kintsu (liquid staking), aPriori (MEV-aware liquid staking/block building), and Magpie (yield aggregation). --- **TVL and Growth Drivers** **Current State**: TVL is effectiv...
experiences.lesson: Reject any contracts claiming Monad mainnet deployment until Q2 2025 launch; verify all tokens are testnet-only to avoid scams.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Reject any contracts claiming Monad mainnet deployment until Q2 2025 launch; verify all tokens are testnet-only to avoid scams.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 在 Monad 主网 Q2 2025 正式上线前，应拒绝相信任何声称已主网上线的合约；确认所有代币仍是测试网资产以规避诈骗。

experiences.goal: Research and analyze the current DeFi yield landscape on Monad blockchain. Identify the top yield-generating protocols, their APY ranges, supported asset types, and TVL data. Focus on lending protocols, liquidity pools, staking opportunities, and any yield aggregators available on Monad. Return a comprehensive list of opportunities with risk categories (low/medium/high).
experiences.lesson: Verify mainnet is live before researching yields; pre-launch chains lack real TVL and only offer speculative point accrual.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Verify mainnet is live before researching yields; pre-launch chains lack real TVL and only offer speculative point accrual.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 研究收益前先确认主网已上线；预发布链没有真实 TVL，只提供投机性的积分积累。

experiences.goal:
Perform a comprehensive safety scan of the top DeFi protocol tokens expected to launch or bridge to Monad. Analyze: 1) Protocol audit status and security history, 2) Team backgrounds and doxxing levels, 3) Tokenomics and supply mechanics, 4) Insurance fund availability, 5) Any historical exploits or vulnerabilities. Focus on protocols likely to be major players on Monad like Curvance, aPriori, Magma, Kintsu, and other announced integrations. Provide safety ratings and red flags.

Context from previous phases:
[Yield Analyst] **Important Disclaimer**: Monad mainnet is not yet live (currently in testnet/devnet phase with mainnet expected Q4 2024 - Q1 2025). The following analysis covers **upcoming protocols**, **testnet participation opportunities**, and **expected yield mechanics** based on announced integrations and native builds. No actual TVL or verified APY data exists for a live Monad mainnet at this time. --- ## 1. Market Context **Network Status**: Monad is in advanced testnet stages (devnet accessible, public testnet pending) with EVM-equivalence and 10,000 TPS capability. The ecosystem is in "pre-deposit" and "points farming" phase. **Yield Environment**: - No native yield exists yet (chain not producing real value) - Current "yields" are denominated in **points** (future airdrop rights) and **testnet incentives** - Expected mainnet yields will likely mirror early Arbitrum/Optimism dynamics: elevated incentives (20-100% APY) decaying to sustainable 3-15% as TVL arrives - Gas costs expected to be <1...
experiences.lesson: Do not run automated token scans on pre-launch protocols; manually verify team credentials and audit reports until contracts deploy.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Do not run automated token scans on pre-launch protocols; manually verify team credentials and audit reports until contracts deploy.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 对尚未正式上线的协议不要做自动化代币扫描；在合约部署前应人工核验团队背景和审计报告。

experiences.goal:
Write a concise DeFi portfolio allocation plan for Monad blockchain. Include: 1) Current status: Monad mainnet launching Q4 2024 - Q1 2025, 2) Pre-mainnet actions: Testnet participation for airdrops (Curvance, aPriori, Kintsu, Magma), 3) Post-launch allocation tiers: Conservative (40% liquid staking via Magma/Kintsu, 30% lending via Curvance, 30% stable LP), Moderate (add DEX LP positions), Aggressive (restaking, early protocol farming), 4) Safety rules: Max 20% per protocol, exit plan for >30% drawdowns, 5) Timeline: Testnet now → Mainnet launch → 3-month consolidation → Full allocation. Format as a professional investment brief.
